tool_description: UniBit aggregates and analyzes financial events for thousands of companies
name: UniBit AI
title: UniBit AI

api_list.name: Realtime Stock Price
api_list.description: This API returns intraday time series data for any specified stock.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://unibit-ai.p.rapidapi.com/realtimestock/AAPL?AccessKey=demo"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "unibit-ai.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://unibit-ai.p.rapidapi.com/realtimestock/AAPL?AccessKey=demo"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "unibit-ai.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
